There is 1 season of "The Bastard Executioner."

This multifaceted analysis underscores the importance of understanding both the creative and commercial aspects of television series, providing a comprehensive view of why some shows succeed while others do not.

In summary, "The Bastard Executioner" had only one season, and its cancellation reflects broader trends in the television industry regarding audience engagement and the challenges of sustaining a series in a competitive market.
